node.statement: POLYNOMIAL IDENTIFICATION: The interpolation ASEP polynomials F*_mu(x;q,t) = T_{sigma_mu} E*_lambda are Hecke-algebra images of the nonsymmetric interpolation Macdonald polynomial. At q=1, the homogeneous ASEP polynomials f_mu(x;q=1,t) are stationary weights of the inhomogeneous multispecies t-PushTASEP [AMW24], with P_lambda(x;q=1,t) as partition function.
